references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational concept for the field and the basis for many of the methods used in this paper.
This paper provides a crucial theoretical foundation for understanding diffusion models, including the forward and reverse processes and their relationship to score matching.

references.paper_title: Zigzag diffusion sampling: Diffusion models can self-improve via self-reflection
references.reason: This paper introduces Z-sampling, which is shown in this paper to be a specific instance of W2SD, highlighting the relationship between the two methods.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of the design space of diffusion models, which is relevant to understanding the limitations of existing methods addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, which are used as strong models in several experiments within this paper, showcasing its practical application.
